hero.title: Boost Your Website's Visibility in Google Search
hero.subtitle: No more waiting weeks for Google to find your content. Our automated tool directly submits your pages to Google's index, improving visibility and driving more organic traffic to your content.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose RankDaily?
whyChoose.subtitle: Our powerful indexing solution offers unique advantages that other tools simply can't match

feature1.title: Faster Indexing
feature1.description: Get your content indexed by Google 5-10 times faster than waiting for natural crawling, giving you a crucial competitive edge.

feature2.title: Unlimited Submissions
feature2.description: Unlike competitors who only use GSC API (limited to 200 URLs/day), our dual approach allows virtually unlimited URL submissions daily.

feature3.title: Smart Automation
feature3.description: Set it once and forget it! Automatic crawling and submission on your schedule means zero manual work required.

feature4.title: No Rate Limits
feature4.description: Our proprietary technology avoids CAPTCHAs and rate limits that plague other tools, ensuring reliable indexing at scale.

feature5.title: Performance Analytics
feature5.description: Detailed reports and insights show you exactly which URLs were submitted, indexed, and how your content is performing.

feature6.title: Multi-Platform Support
feature6.description: Works with any CMS or website platform - WordPress, Shopify, custom sites, and more - with no plugins required.

howItWorks.title: How RankDaily Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get your content indexed in three simple steps

step1.title: Connect Your Website
step1.description: Sign up and connect your domain through our simple verification process. No technical setup required.

step2.title: Submit Your Content
step2.description: Add URLs manually, upload in bulk, or connect your sitemap for automatic discovery of new content.

step3.title: Watch Your Content Get Indexed
step3.description: Our system automatically submits your URLs to Google using our proprietary dual-approach method for faster indexing.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our indexing service

q1.question: How exactly does Auto Submit Site work?
q1.answer: Auto Submit Site uses a combination of APIs and specialized algorithms to submit your webpages directly to Google's indexing system. We leverage both the "site:" operator method and direct submission via Google Search Console API to ensure maximum coverage and speed.

q2.question: How quickly will my content be indexed?
q2.answer: Most submitted URLs are indexed within 24-48 hours, compared to 1-4 weeks for natural crawling. However, indexing speed may vary depending on your site's authority and content quality. Our data shows an average 5x improvement in indexing time.

q3.question: Do I need technical knowledge to use this?
q3.answer: Not at all. Our user-friendly dashboard makes it easy to submit and monitor your URLs with just a few clicks. Simply paste your URLs or connect your sitemap, and our system handles the rest. No coding or SEO expertise required.

q4.question: How is this different from manually submitting URLs?
q4.answer: Manual submission is time-consuming and limited. Our automated approach allows you to submit thousands of URLs on a scheduled basis, tracks indexing status, and uses multiple submission methods to maximize success rates.

q5.question: Will this help my SEO and rankings?
q5.answer: Faster indexing doesn't directly improve rankings, but it ensures your content appears in search results sooner. This means you can start gaining traffic and building engagement metrics faster, indirectly supporting your SEO efforts.
